source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT CMONTH2 AS CMONTH    
  FROM CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST
WHERE CMONTH2 BETWEEN '202101' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMM')
GROUP BY CMONTH2
ORDER BY CMONTH2
